[Home](./index.md) &gt; [zotero-plugin-toolkit](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.md) &gt; [Prompt](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.prompt.md)

## Prompt class

Prompt for setting up or executing some commands quickly.

`Shift + P` can show/hide its UI anywhere after registering commands.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Prompt 
```

</td></tr>
